structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Enforcement of collection of tax bills by urban-county government and city of home rule class.
law.text: In addition to those powers granted in this chapter for the collection of ad valorem taxes, any urban-county government or city of the home rule class may enforce collection of any tax bill due it by the procedure authorized by the provisions of KRS 91.484 to 91.527, except the statute of limitations shall, in all cases, be that set forth in KRS 134.546.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 102, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 62, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 314, sec. 8, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1980.
